My Services

My Services

Frontend Development

Building modern and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, and React.js with a focus on performance and accessibility.

Shopify Theme & App Development

Creating custom Shopify themes and embedded apps tailored to merchants' needs, with seamless integration and clean, optimized code.

UI/UX Implementation

Translating design prototypes into pixel-perfect, user-friendly interfaces that enhance usability, improve user experience, and support business goals.

Shopify Premium Section Pack

This product is a bundle of pre-built, high-converting Shopify sections that merchants can easily drag-and-drop into their existing themes. Built using Liquid and Tailwind CSS (or CSS/SCSS), these sections include hero banners, product sliders, testimonials, FAQs, countdowns, and custom call-to-action blocks.

Each section is fully responsive, Polaris-inspired, and optimized for SEO and performance. They are beginner-friendly, meaning store owners don’t need coding knowledge to install and use them. Documentation and video tutorials can also be bundled to help users get started quickly

View Project

Mockup Design

HAS Hygiene is a modern, responsive portfolio website built to showcase the services, values, and brand identity of a cleaning and hygiene company. The goal of the website was to establish a credible and professional digital presence that reflects the company’s commitment to cleanliness, customer satisfaction, and service excellence.

The site features a clean and minimal design, intuitive navigation, and well-structured content sections, including company information, service categories, customer testimonials, and a contact form. I focused on creating a layout that is visually appealing and easy to use, especially for non-technical visitors who may be accessing the site from mobile devices.
